mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Frazier, James to Oakes, James
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Frazier, James
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Brig Gen Oakes Wheeling Aug 14 By Telegraph from Oakland Aug 14 1861. Please send to Jacob Kepler authority to raise a company at Selby's Pont Maryland for fourth 4 Virginia requirement. Send it to Capt Snider at this place Col. Jas Frazier 25FN85pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Frazier, James
Oakland, Maryland
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Oakes, James
